hero.title: Developer Building Backend Infrastructure for Centralized Web Systems
hero.description: Young, hardworking, ambitious, and adaptable Backend Developer with 3+ years of experience, Student and Instructor
hero.skillsIntro: I have mastered the following technologies and skills

pythonBackend.title: Python Backend
pythonBackend.description: Architecting high-performance APIs and microservices using Django REST, FastAPI, and Flask. Focusing on scalability and efficient data processing.

devopsCloud.title: DevOps & Cloud
devopsCloud.description: Implementing CI/CD pipelines, containerization with Docker/Kubernetes, and cloud infrastructure management for reliable system operation.

iotEngineering.title: IoT Engineering
iotEngineering.description: Designing IoT solutions and systems for connected devices, enabling real-time data collection and device management.

mentorship.title: Mentorship
mentorship.description: Teaching and guiding developers, sharing best practices, and helping to develop technical skills in software engineering.

companies.title: Companies & Teams

companies.journeySubtitle: A journey through innovative teams and cutting-edge projects

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: A passionate developer focused on backend development and education
about.description: I'm a software engineer specializing in Python Backend and DevOps. My journey started with a curiosity for programming and has evolved into building scalable systems and teaching others.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: Let's connect and solve pressing problems together!
contact.reachOut: Feel free to reach out through any of these channels

projectsPage.title: Projects Portfolio
projectsPage.subtitle: A curated selection of production-ready systems I designed and delivered across healthcare, logistics, retail, and construction.

constructionCrm.title: Construction CRM
constructionCrm.description: An end-to-end construction business platform managing sites, buildings, apartment sales, contracts, accounting, materials, and workforce operations with role-based access. Beyond CRUD, it includes apartment lifecycle workflows, installment contract handling, supplier and salary expense tracking, UZS/USD exchange support, analytics with PDF/export reporting, and Telegram/SMS automation. Built for production with NestJS, PostgreSQL, Redis, React, secure authentication, and RBAC.

posSystem.title: POS System
posSystem.description: A full retail operations platform for local merchants handling inventory, sales, stock flow, and supplier/product debt management. It implements FIFO-based inventory logic, transaction tracking, audit-ready inventory logs, and daily operational reporting for real business usage.

carting.title: Carting Logistics Platform
carting.description: carting.uz is a digital logistics platform in Uzbekistan for booking and managing transport or delivery tasks. It centralizes request flow, service operations, and dispatch coordination, with a companion mobile app for broader user access and field execution.

mymdcard.title: MyMDCard Medical Platform
mymdcard.description: A secure medical information platform built with Django REST Framework and React.js for storing and sharing health data. It includes encrypted records, JWT authentication with MFA, NFC/QR emergency access, and dedicated admin/member dashboards. The system is optimized with PostgreSQL and caching, and designed as a HIPAA-oriented scalable architecture.
